title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
**Advertisement:**

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse: a game-changer in computer input devices. With its sleek design and versatile features, this trackball mouse is perfect for both left-handed and right-handed users.

Measuring a comfortable 7 inches long, 2.5 inches high, and 4 inches wide, the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 fits effortlessly in your hand. Choose from three elegant colors: red, gray, or white, to match your personal style.

Experience unparalleled precision with a DPI (dots per inch) resolution of 300. Connect this marvel to your computer via PS/2 or USB, making it compatible with a wide range of systems.

The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 comes equipped with an intuitive trackball and two responsive buttons for seamless navigation. Effortlessly scroll side-to-side with the touch of a thumb, increasing your productivity and efficiency.

Crafted to perfection in China, this masterpiece combines style, functionality, and convenience. Make your computing experience more enjoyable and efficient - upgrade to the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse today!

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse: a sleek and sophisticated addition to your workspace. With both PS/2 and USB connectivity options, this versatile mouse suits any desktop setup. Experience precise control with a high-resolution 300 DPI trackball, ensuring every click lands exactly where you intend. Available in vibrant red, elegant gray, or pristine white, there's a color to fit your personal style.

Measuring just 7 inches long, 2.5 inches high, and 4 inches wide, this compact powerhouse is perfect for those who value space-saving design. Equipped with two comfortable buttons and the convenient side-to-side scrolling feature, this mouse offers maximum comfort and productivity. Suitable for both left-handed and right-handed users, it's an inclusive choice that fits any hand.

Crafted with care in China, the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse delivers top-tier performance and design, making it an essential tool for your daily computing needs. Upgrade your workspace today!

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse - a sleek and innovative input device designed to enhance your computing experience. With its stylish and modern design, available in captivating colors of red, gray, and white, this trackball mouse is sure to complement any workspace.

The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 offers unparalleled flexibility with its dual connectivity options - PS/2 and USB. You can easily switch between devices or use both for maximum compatibility. The high-precision tracking, boasting a DPI of 300, guarantees smooth cursor movement and precise control - perfect for graphic designers, developers, or anyone who values accuracy in their work.

Experience the convenience of side-to-side scrolling with this versatile trackball mouse. With two programmable buttons, you can customize your shortcuts to save time and streamline your workflow. Suitable for both left-handed and right-handed users, everyone in your household or office can enjoy the benefits of the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse.

Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this mouse is compact yet ergonomically designed - measuring just 7 inches long, 2.5 inches high, and 4 inches wide. The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is engineered in China, ensuring quality and durability for your daily computing needs. Upgrade your workspace with the unmatched performance of the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 - order yours today!

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse - a sleek and innovative solution for your desktop computing needs! With its stylish marble finish available in captivating colors of red, gray, and white, this trackball mouse is not only functional but also an eye-catching addition to your workspace.

Experience the freedom of using a trackball instead of a traditional mouse with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017. This versatile device boasts both PS/2 and USB connectivity, allowing you to seamlessly transition between different computer systems. The high-resolution tracking with 300 DPI delivers precise cursor control, ensuring smooth navigation through your digital world.

The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 is designed for all-day comfort, catering to both left- and right-handed users. With its ergonomic design and two conveniently placed buttons, you'll be able to work more efficiently than ever before. Additionally, enjoy the added convenience of side-to-side scrolling, making it a breeze to navigate long documents or web pages.

Crafted with meticulous attention to detail in China, this Logitech masterpiece measures 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width - perfect for a comfortable grip and effortless maneuverability. Elevate your computing experience today with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse!

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse - a sleek and innovative input device that combines style and functionality for both left-handed and right-handed users. With its compact size of 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width, this stylish mouse fits comfortably in your hand, whether you're a seasoned professional or just starting out.

Experience the freedom of connectivity with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017, as it comes equipped with both PS/2 and USB compatibility. Enjoy seamless transitions between devices with ease. The mouse also boasts an impressive 300 DPI resolution, ensuring precise and accurate tracking for all your computing needs.

The star of the show is its luxurious marble trackball - not only does it look great in your choice of red, gray, or white colors, but it also provides a smooth and responsive scrolling experience. With side-to-side scrolling capabilities and just two perfectly placed buttons, this mouse allows you to navigate your digital world with ease and efficiency.

Designed and engineered in China, the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 is more than just a computer accessory â€“ it's an essential tool for those who demand the best from their technology. Upgrade your workspace today and make every click count!

**Advertisement Description:**

Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse - a sleek and innovative desktop companion designed to elevate your computing experience. With its stylish design available in vibrant red, modern gray, or pristine white, this trackball mouse is sure to match your personal style.

Measuring just 7 inches long, 2.5 inches high, and 4 inches wide, the compact Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 fits comfortably on any desk. Connect it easily with either PS/2 or USB for maximum compatibility with your computer system.

Experience unparalleled precision with a DPI of 300, ensuring every click and scroll is precise and accurate. The large, smooth trackball allows for effortless movement and control, while the two conveniently placed buttons provide quick access to all your favorite functions.

The Trackman Marble 2017 also features side-to-side scrolling, allowing you to navigate long documents or webpages with ease. Suitable for both left-handed and right-handed users, this versatile mouse is the perfect addition to any workspace.

Crafted from high-quality materials in China, this Logitech masterpiece not only delivers superior performance but also exudes an air of sophistication. Upgrade your computing experience today with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse!
